channel.title: CVE Feed for Modernaweb Studio -- Black Widgets For Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Modernaweb Studio -- Black Widgets For Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-39644|2024-08-02T18:18:53.092Z -- modernaweb%20studio -- black%20widgets%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Modernaweb Studio Black Widgets For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Black Widgets For Elementor: from n/a through 1.3.5.
